Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Sox-35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Sox-35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from Roosevelt to 63rd/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions until 5:30pm.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
